subject: [Radiance-general] vnd.radiance is now an IANA image media typ
body:
Randolph Fritz wrote:

Great work, thank you!!!

One note to be added to the list for the next update: under applications
using the format, imagemagick should be added, as it is used by a lot of
application for image handling. I use it quite frequently for quick
conversion to jpg (using convert -gamma 2.2 in.hdr out.jpg) when I want
e.g. to send a preview by mail. Not urgent really, but if you should
ever want to update the record, you could include this.

CU Lars.
